mapper.select: SELECT acm_id, acm_name, acm_price, acm_photo1 FROM tbl_acm WHERE acm_id = #{acmId}
SELECT member_code, member_id, member_name, phone_no FROM tbl_member WHERE member_code = #{member_code}

SELECT p.pay_date as payDate, a.acm_name as acmName, r.guest_count as guestCount, r.check_in as checkIn, r.check_out as checkOut, p.pay_price as payPrice FROM tbl_pay p JOIN tbl_reservations r ON p.pay_id = r.pay_id -- tbl_pay와 tbl_reservations를 pay_id로 JOIN JOIN tbl_acm a ON p.acm_id = a.acm_id -- tbl_pay와 tbl_acm을 acm_id로 JOIN WHERE r.member_code = #{memberCode} -- 회원 코드로 필터링 (파라미터로 전달된 값)

SELECT p.pay_id as payId, p.pay_date as payDate, m.member_name as memberName, m.member_id as memberId, a.acm_name as acmName, r.guest_count as guestCount, r.check_in as checkIn, r.check_out as checkOut, p.pay_price as payPrice, p.discount as discount, p.pay_method as payMethod, p.pay_status as payStatus, p.pay_type as payType, p.transaction_id as transactionId, p.pay_ref as payRef FROM tbl_pay p JOIN tbl_reservations r ON p.pay_id = r.pay_id -- tbl_pay와 tbl_reservations를 pay_id로 JOIN JOIN tbl_acm a ON p.acm_id = a.acm_id -- tbl_pay와 tbl_acm을 acm_id로 JOIN JOIN tbl_member m ON p.member_code = m.member_code -- tbl_pay와 tbl_member를 member_code로 JOIN ORDER BY p.pay_date DESC
